column4: guys ubuntu is crashing and my nvidia driver was downloaded and installed for nothing
any1 wanna tell me how come i dont get anything from " nvidia-xconfig " ?
someone please tell me why i cant configure X on my nvidia graphic card
please don't PM, keep it in the channel.
no1 is answering me in the channel
i will nto answer you in PM, either.
once you run sudo nvidia-config you should  log out then back in. then run gksudo nvidia-settings .. none of this will work if you have not installed a nVidia driver
when i type sudo nvidia-config it says command not found
then it is not installed. sudo apt-get install nvidia-config
now it says " E: Couldn't find package nvidia-config " ,, the nvidia driver was downloaded 30 min ago
how did you get the nvidia driver?
some1 showed me how to get it and it downloaded like +60MB then spent 10 min unpacking and setting up
okay, that still does not tell me how you acquired the driver. did you sudo apt-get something or use synaptic or download it from nVidia?
